t: Amorepacific pivots away from China - The Korea Herald
s: March 2, 2023 - Amorepacific said sales of its major cosmetic brand Laneige in the US particularly drove up overall profits in North America, declining to mention the exact amount by which the brand's sales rose. "We largely reaped profits in North America by aggressively marketing Laneige products in the US and Canada. Laneige is one of the best-sellers in North America, and its sales reaped profits from major North American retail channels such as Amazon ...
